verbs.description: [ARG0: jcpenney] [V: warns] [ARG1: that trump tariffs will worsen the retail apocalypse] jcpenney counsel is predicting that the trump administration tariffs on chinese goods will adversely impact the chain middle class shoppers — and hasten the retail apocalypse white house trump target ceo national retail federation walmart robert e lighthizer business insider macy robert e lighthizer china representative us jcpenney acain businessinsider com david m spooner david m spooner
